name: s3-lambda-dynamodb
description: A test project for AWS learning

scripts.sam:deploy: sam deploy --stack-name s3-lambda-dynamodb --region eu-central-1 --s3-bucket s3-lambda-dynamodb-code --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run sam:validate && npm install --production && npm run sam:build && npm run sam:deploy

author: Arkadiy Shuvaev
